summary: Compiliation of third party recreations of atmospheric Daggerfall music adapted for skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Extract to your Skyrim folder.

This pack does as the title suggests, and adds various people\'s reinterpretations of some of the most atmospheric music from daggerfall to skyrim by replacing some of the less-noticeable tracks in the OST. I tried to use songs that fit the style of the game and meshed well with the original OST.

Dungeon Crawls are scarier, night time is eerier, and overall the game becomes a more atmospheric experience!

Includes several day, night, mountain, snowfall and dungeon themes, as well as a special track that plays when discovering some dungeons

NOTE: If you want this music but don\'t want to replace some of skyrim\'s OST, you can download Personalized Music, and use these as additions to the game OST instead of replacements.

WARNING: DO NOT DOWNLOAD 1.0, MOUNTAIN REGIONS AND SNOWY WEATHER ARE BUGGED, DOWNLOAD 1.2 INSTEAD.

[b]CURRENT VERSION CHANGES[/b]
- added several extra dungeon and explore tracks
- tweaked existing tracks to transition better, so they mesh well with the original OST and each other

[b]OPTIONAL DOWNLOADS:[/b]

[b]Snow and Mountain tracks for Personalized music[/b] - Remember how in daggerfall it would play specific songs if it was snowing? This version is a small addon for anyone who has personalized music so it plays the wintery songs in that type of weather, and it also has mountain specific songs as well. Drop straight in your music folder. MUST HAVE PERSONALIZED MUSIC INSTALLED FOR THIS TO WORK - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13286/
author: Bloodshot

files.name: Snow and Mountain tracks for Personalized Music
